overview: The fourth in a series of feature-length documentaries about Progressive rock written and directed by Adele Schmidt and José Zegarra Holder.  Krautrock, Part 1 focuses on German progressive rock, popularly known as Krautrock, from in and around the Cologne, Düsseldorf, and Hamburg regions of Germany.  Artist featured include Kraftwerk, Neu, Can, Faust and others.
title: Romantic Warriors IV: Krautrock (Part I)
